name: Star Gazing Ring
description:
Reticulated  sterling silver plate formed into a unique band.
Holes are drilled into the plate which reminds me of various patterns of the stars.

This ring has been sold, but please email me with desired ring size and I will make your very own.

name: Seed Pod Earrings
description:
A pair sterling silver wire pods dangle from these hammered, sterling botanical leaf shapes.

These earrings are approximately 1.5" in length and hang from hand crafted sterling ear wires.  

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Tied Up and Twisted Earrings
description:
Fine sterling silver wire is twisted into a ball and dangles from a sterling wire approximately 1" in length.

Ear wires are hand forged sterling silver.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Lake Michigan Beach Stone Bracelet
description:
This sterling silver bracelet is handcrafted and slightly hammered to achieve an organic look.  Two beautiful Lake Michigan beach stones dangle from this bracelet.

Please indicate your size in an email to me.

Size 6 (extra-small) = 62mm / 2.4" Inner Diameter
Size 7 (small) = 64mm / 2.5" Inner Diameter
Size 8 (medium) = 67mm / 2.6" Inner Diameter

**The bracelet pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Lake Michigan Beach Stone Necklace
description:
A Lake Michigan beach stone hangs from a hand forged, 12 gauge round sterling wire.
You choose between a 16", 18" or 24"  sterling silver ball chain.


**The necklace pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Hammered Sterling Circle Necklace
description:
A chunky, sterling wire, hand forged into a circle, slides elegantly on a dainty sterling chain.

The circle is hammered and has a light charcoal patina to show off it's organic patterns.

**The necklace pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Chain Link Bracelet with Love Bead
description:
This gorgeous Sterling Silver chain bracelet is inspired by the organic shape of rocks of the South Pacific Sea. It features hand made links which have been shaped, formed and polished.

Hanging from the clasp is a sterling silver hand dappered bead, stamped with "love"
I will custom stamp the bead with any word you like, up to 5 letters.

Please email me with the desired length of the bracelet.

**The bracelet pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Red Copper Poppy Earrings
description:
Sterling silver drops are soldered on to domed circles of copper and quenched in cold water to make these red poppy earrings. They hang on my hand forged sterling ear wires, approximately 1.5 inches in diameter.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Etched Copper and Sterling Earrings
description:
Domed sterling silver earrings with a copper etched layer soldered on top.
I used a light grey patina to enhance the hand scripted etched design in the copper.

The earrings are approximately 1" in diameter and hang on handcrafted sterling ear wires.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Venus and Jupiter Earrings
description:
Sterling silver wires are torched into a ball, hammered slightly and soldered on to a pair of hand forged sterling ring shaped earrings.  I named them Venus and Jupiter because the balled silver has a subtle pattern that looks like the surface of a planet.

The earrings hang on my hand forged sterling silver ear wires and are approximate a 1/4" in diameter.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Moon Lover Ring
description:
Pieces of copper and sterling silver metals were hand cut, soldered and domed to make this ring.
The ring is approximately 3/4" in diameter and with a copper backing and sterling circle, reminiscent of the full moon.
It sits on top of a wide, yet comfortable sterling band with a slightly hammered and burnished texture.

This ring has been sold, but let me make one just for you!
Please email me with a desired ring size.

name: Little Leaf Earrings
description:
These sweet little sterling silver earrings are approximately 1" long.  I added a charcoal patina and matte finish to enhance the thin sterling "vein" that runs down the middle.
They hang from my hand forged sterling ear wires.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Big Circle, Little Circle Necklace
description:
Two hand forged sterling rings ( one chunky and one rather dainty) hangs together,  sliding loosely along a sterling ball chain.
The rings together, make a lovely chime when worn together.

The rings are approximately 3/4" and 1/2" in diameter, one being slightly larger than the other.

Please indicate if you want the ball chain length at 16 or 18 inches.

**The necklace pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Boxed Flower Necklace
description:
Custom Order ***SOLD***

This copper necklace is etched and hangs on dainty rings of sterling silver chain.
I have used a light charcoal patina to make the pattern stand out.

Please contact me directly for a custom order.

name: Tied Up and Twisted Bracelet-Copper Bangle withand Silver
description:
A copper bangle, hand forged in my studio, with and  tied up and twisted piece of sterling silver wire dangling from it!

Please indicate your size in an email to me.

Size 6 (extra-small) = 62mm / 2.4" Inner Diameter
Size 7 (small) = 64mm / 2.5" Inner Diameter
Size 8 (medium) = 67mm / 2.6" Inner Diameter

**The bracelet pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Solana Beach Stone Ring
description:
This ring is made from a South Pacific beach stone found in Solana Beach, California.

The stone sits upon a sterling silver base, held firmly in place with prongs.


This ring was a custom order and has been sold.
If you would like something similar in design, please contact me to discuss!

name: Cluster of Three Ring
description:
Three clusters of sterling silver balls are nestled atop a sleek, low dome silver band.

This ring can be made to size.

The ring you order will not be the exact one shown here, but a similar design.

name: Copper Tree Earrings
description:
These earrings are hand etched and finished with a light charcoal patina to make the tree pattern really stand out.

The earrings are approximately 2" x 1/2" and hang on my hand forged sterling silver ear wires.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Sterling Silver Moon Dangle Earrings
description:
Hand sawed sterling disks are reticulated( heated right up to melting  point to achieve a lovely, rippled and ridged effect) and then domed into a subtle half sphere.  They dangle playfully from forged sterling silver rings.

They are approximately 1 1/2" in length and 1/2" in diameter.
They hand on my sterling silver ear wires.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Hammered Sterling Silver Disk Earrings
description:
Hand cut silver disks have been hammered and slightly domed.
I gave them a light charcoal patina and hand buffed the surface to bring out the texture and pattern. 

These earrings are approximately 1/2" in diameter and hang 1" in length and hang on my hand forged sterling ear wires.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Three Pod Sterling Silver Bangle
description:
This sterling silver bangle has 3 pods that dangle from it. I felt it added more dimension to the common plain bangle and love the chime it makes. This bangle is great for everyday and special occasions. Each bangle is cut, formed and soldered in my studio.

I finished the bracelet with a light charcoal patina and matte finish for a more organic look.

Please indicate your size in an email to me.

Size 6 (extra-small) = 62mm / 2.4" Inner Diameter
Size 7 (small) = 64mm / 2.5" Inner Diameter
Size 8 (medium) = 67mm / 2.6" Inner Diameter

**The bracelet pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Pohutukawa Necklace
description:
This copper pendant was inspired by the New Zealand Christmas
tree, the Pohutukawa.
Pohutukawa grow best close to the sea where they often produce massive spreading trees that overhang the water. When in flower during December and January they provide a brilliant spectacle, smothered as they are with masses of crimson to brilliant-red flowers. In the fall, the leaves turn a brilliant coppery red and drop to the ground.

When copper is heated and then quickly quenched in water, it turns a beautiful red color, which reminds me of the pohutukawa leaf. It hangs from brown matte seed beads or sterling silver chain.

Please indicate length and material you desire for the neck chain.

**The necklace pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Tied Up and Twisted Necklace
description:
I torched heated the ends of sterling silver wire into balls and  tied up and twisted them into a tangled shape pendant. I then applied a light charcoal patina and then highly polished it to a glimmer!

The twisted pendent slides smoothly on a 16" or 18" sterling ball chain. 
24" sterling chain is available for $7 additional cost.
Please contact me to confirm desired length of chain.

**The necklace pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Open Leaf Necklace
description:
I forged these sterling silver wires into large prominent leaf shapes which hang from a sterling silver chain.

The leafs are approximately 2''x 1.5" One slightly larger than the other.

PLEASE EMAIL ME WITH DESIRED CHAIN LENGTH.

**The necklace pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Bone Necklace
description:
Sterling silver wire is torched heated on each end which creates a ball of silver.  They are then hammered into a flat circle and  dangle from sterling silver chain. The longest "bone" being approx 1" in length in the middle.
Finished with a charcoal patina and matte burnish.
The clasp of the necklace is one of my sterling silver hand forged designs.

Please email with desired length of chain.

**The necklace pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Sterling Silver of Waning Moon Earrings
description:
Sterling silver double hoop earring are hand forged into a slight flattened shape. I soldered half circles onto the lower hoop to create a half moon shape.

The earrings are approximately 1.5" in length and hang on a pair of hand forged sterling earrings.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Bands of Turquoise Ring
description:
Three hammered sterling silver bands are held together by a lovely piece of Natural Sleeping Beauty Turquoise, hand set in a silver bezel.
The particular piece holds one of two turquoise cabochons that were given to me by a jeweler selling his wares on the outskirts of the Grand Canyon. 

Ring size is 7.5

This ring is hand forged one of a kind and is exactly what you will receive.

name: Copper Open Connection Earrings
description:
These earrings are made from copper wire, hammered into a slightly flattened texture, soldered and hand shaped into an "open connection" shape.
The copper rings hang on small linked, sterling silver chain and connected to my hand forged ear wires.

The earrings are approximately 2" in length and 1" in diameter.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Agate Ring
description:
*****Custom design******
         ****SOLD****

name: Open Connection Ring
description:
Sterling silver wire is formed into a open ring and slightly hammered into a concave shape, that fits comfortably on your finger.

Please email me with desired ring size.

The ring that you order will not be the exact one pictured here, but a similar design.

name: Rock on a Waxing Moon Earrings
description:
Sterling silver sheet has been reticulated with a rippled texture that reminds me of the moon's surface. 
Lake Michigan beach stones hang from these earrings on hand forged sterling ear wires.
The diameter of the earrings are approximately 1".

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Biggs Picture Jasper Necklace
description: ***SOLD***

name: Turquoise Cowboy Hat Ring
description:
This Blue Sky cabochon is one of two pieces of Turquoise that was given to me by a AZ jewelry artist, selling his wares upon entering the Grand Canyon.

The stone is set in a fine silver bezel upon an oval setting at a slight angle.  The bezel is surrounded by small beaded wire.

I finished it with light charcoal patina and matte finish to make the stone and beads pop.

Ring size is 7.5

This ring is an original and will be the exact one you order.

name: Red Copper Poppy Necklace
description:
I used a jewelry saw to cut the copper and then formed it into a slight domed shape. I then soldered three tiny silver balls onto the center of the pendant and quenched the copper in water, which turns the copper a gorgeous, deep red.

The Poppy Pendant is approximately 1.5" in diameter.
The pendant hangs on a sterling silver ball chain.
Please indicate the length of 16" or 18" chain in a email to me.

**The necklace pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Turquoise Necklace
description: This necklace has been sold.

name: Tapa Flower
description:
Another pendant inspired by the South Pacific.
This necklace is made from copper sheet metal, with a sterling silver tapa flower design hand cut and soldered on top.
I oxidized it with a charcoal patina and hand burnished with a matte texture to achieve the desired finish.

The circle pendant is domed and approximately 1.5" in diameter and and hangs from a sterling silver 16" or 18" ball chain.  Please indicate desired length in an email.

**The necklace pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Lake Michigan Beach Stone Long Chain Necklace
description:
Recently, I have been drawn to long chain necklace designs and decided to craft one with natural river stones. Long necklaces are very versatile in that you can wear them alone or layer them with additional chains and necklaces of varying lengths. 

A sterling tear shape pendant with three drilled river stones hang from a 77 mm sterling chain -round cable necklace. 

**The necklace pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Sterling Silver Pacific Necklace
description:
I am very drawn to artwork that depicts south pacific flora and fauna. I created this sterling silver necklace with these two images  in mind. 

This piece was made using a jeweler's saw, piercing and cutting the shape of tapa flowers into a flat sheet of sterling silver.   
I then hammered and oxidized the necklace to give the pendant more depth.

It is approximately 1.5" wide by 2" long and hangs on a 18' sterling ball chain.

**The necklace pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Reticulated Sterling Disk Necklace
description:
A hand cut piece of sterling has been heat reticulated with a jewelers torch which results in the pendant surface having a beautiful rippled and ridged effect.

The pendant hangs on a 18" sterling silver ball chain and is approximately 3/4" in diameter.

**The necklace pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Feather Rolled Sterling Silver Ring
description: ***This ring has been sold***

name: Tied Up and Twisted Bracelet- Sterling Silver
description:
A sterling silver bangle, hand forged in my studio, with and  tied up and twisted piece of sterling silver wire dangling from it!

Size 6 (extra-small) = 62mm / 2.4" Inner Diameter
Size 7 (small) = 64mm / 2.5" Inner Diameter
Size 8 (medium) = 67mm / 2.6" Inner Diameter

**The bracelet pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Rock on Mars Necklace
description:
Sterling silver has been reticulated to form a rippled and ridged effect. A smooth, grey Lake Michigan beach stone hangs on the front of the silver, make an interesting contrast. 
The pendant is approximate 1.5" in diameter and hangs on an 18"
sterling ball chain.

**The necklace pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Sterling and Copper Linked Bracelet
description:
Copper and sterling silver wire have been hand forged into organic shaped links and soldered together to make this stunning bracelet.  

Please email me the desired length for your bracelet.

**The bracelet pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Hammered Copper and Silver Moon Earrings
description:
These slightly domed sterling silver and copper earrings are approximately 1 1/4" in diameter.  The copper has a subtle circle texture and I  gave them a charcoal patina and matte finish to complete the look.

They hang on my hand forged sterling silver ear wires.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Long Sterling Silver Connection Earrings
description:
These long playful sterling silver earrings hang approximately 2" off hand forged sterling ear wires.  I left hammer marks on the flattened sterling wire to give them an organic feel.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Sterling Flower Earrings
description:
I used a jeweler's hand saw to cut an organic flower pattern out of sterling silver sheet. I slightly domed the flower and soldered sterling balls onto the center.  I then gave them a light charcoal patina and a matte finish.

These earrings are approximately 3/4" inch in diameter and hang on hand forged sterling silver ear wires.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Lace Embossed Earrings
description:
This pair of trendy silver earrings are made by hand sawing metal shapes and then running them through my rolling mill and imprinting them with a lace motif. I also gave them a charcoal patina and then hand-buffed the surface to bring out the texture and pattern. 
The earring have been slightly domes and hang on my hand forged sterling ear wires.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Lake Michigan Beach Stone Earrings-Chair
description:
These earring are made from Lake Michigan Beach stones and sterling silver wire.
The hand approximately 1" on a pair of hand forged sterling ear wires.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Reticulated Sterling Silver Earrings
description:
I reticulated sterling silver sheet which gives these earrings a beautiful pattern that reminds me of the land textures seen from an airplane.  These earrings are slightly domed and are approximately 1 1/2" in diameter.

They hang on my hand forged sterling silver earrings.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Open Connection Sterling Silver Necklace
description:
This sterling silver necklace consists of a long flattened sterling wire. I left hammer marks in it for an organic feel.

It hangs approximately 2" off a sterling ball chain.
Please email your chain length preference of 16" or 18"

**The necklace pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Long Slender Leaf Earrings
description:
This super sexy pair of sterling silver earrings are a favorite!
I hand cut, formed and forged this pair and then soldered a long vein of sterling silver wire down the center. I placed a scratched matte texture on the surface that makes the leaf vein pop with the dark charcoal patina. 

They hang approximately 2 1/4" off sterling forged ear-wires.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Sterling Silver Stellar Ring
description:
I torch heated silver until it formed 3 different size balls, and soldered them onto a 12 gauge sterling, hand crafted ring.
Highly polished, it reminds me of a cluster of twinkling stars.

Please email me with your desired ring size.

**The ring pictured is not the exact one that you will receive, but  will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Two Circle Earrings
description:
These sterling silver circle earrings have a modern classic look. I gave them a hammered and matte finish for a unique look. 

They are approximately 1 1/2" long and hang on sterling silver ear wires.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**

name: Rock on Mars Earrings
description:
These earring are a combinations of Lake Michigan beach stone earring and reticulated sterling silver.

I hand cut rectangular shapes of sterling sheet and used heat to make this lovely "planet surface" pattern on it.
I hung the beach stone so it dangles playfully in front of the sterling.
Fun to wear!

These earrings are approximately 1/2"wide x 1" long and hand off of my hand forged sterling ear wires.

**The earrings pictured are not the exact ones that you will receive, but they will be the same design. Note that there may be slight variations due to the nature of handmade.**
